plot: The events took place in the Russian Empire in the 19th century. Jõnn is a self-made captain ("metskapten") who has just got himself a new sailing ship, "Fortuuna". When the ship is sailing in the middle of the ocean, the wind suddenly stops blowing and the vessel is stuck in the middle of still and salty water with hungry and thirsty crew on board.
title: Metskapten
